We cannot go back to bad old days when folks were being denied coverage because of a pre-existing condition. 

I'm proud my resolution condemning the Administration's attacks on your health care passed the House today with bipartisan support. https://allred.house.gov/media/press-releases/allred-s-bipartisan-resolution-condemning-administrations-attacks-health-care …

Congress must stand on the side of the people and #ProtectOurCare.

Today, we’ll vote on my resolution calling on the Trump Administration to stop backing a lawsuit that threatens Americans’ health care and protections for those with pre-existing conditions.

On #EqualPayDay we must ensure everyone receives equal pay for equal work. Women earn 80 cents for every dollar men earn. And for women of color, the gap is much wider. 

Proud to have voted for the Paycheck Fairness Act which passed the House last week. https://twitter.com/RepColinAllred/status/1111024232119656448 …
